content.en_us: Rare ore, also found in the nether near the ceiling. Drops fragments that need to be [[shredded|Shredder]]. Also obtainable from shredding lapis dust, or from [[rare earth ore|Rare Earths]].
content.zh_cn:
稀有的主世界矿物，也可在下界天花板附近找到。挖掘后掉落碎片，
需要[[粉碎|Shredder]]处理。也可通过粉碎青金石粉获取，
或通过[[稀土矿石|Rare Earths]]获得。
